sentences.en: Between 1997 and 2000, cumulative imports to China will top 700 billion US dollars.
sentences.cn: 从1997年到2000年, 进口总额累计将超过7000亿美元.

sentences.en: Education inputs, a significant, cumulative million investment, 51 new school buildings chuang.
sentences.cn: 教育事业投入, 效果显著, 累计投入资金万元, 新建校舍51间,教学楼幢.
学习是个逐渐积累的过程。

sentences.en: Like most cumulative processes, the problem matured slowly, even after the steep rises in interest rates.
sentences.cn: 象大多数累积过程一样, 问题是逐步形成的, 甚至在利率直线上升之后也是如此.

sentences.en: Repeated continuous exposure to noise can cause gradual and cumulative damage.
sentences.cn: 长期反复暴露于巨大噪声可引致渐进累积伤害.
科学知识是积累起来的.

sentences.en: Such classes are separated by'natural breaks'in the frequency distribution or the analogous cumulative curve.
sentences.cn: 这样的级可由频率分布或类似的累积曲线中的自然断点划分开来.

sentences.en: Table 1 summarises the affect of permeability on rates and cumulative recovery.
sentences.cn: 表1总结渗透性影响在率和渐增补救的.

sentences.en: The benefits from eating fish are cumulative.
sentences.cn: 吃鱼的好处要长期才能显现。

sentences.en: The mechanism has been termed cumulative feedback inhibition.
sentences.cn: 这种机制就叫作累加反馈抑制.

sentences.en: The process of improvement is a cumulative one.
sentences.cn: 改进的过程是逐渐积累的.

sentences.en: The sorrowful demeanour , the tremolo music, the long, explanatory , cumulative addresses, all were there.
sentences.cn: 悲哀痛苦的姿势, 如泣如诉的音乐, 长长的说明性道白使情节层层推进, 通俗剧的成份一样也没少.

sentences.en: This drug has a cumulative effect.
Wavell responded gallantly to the many cumulative calls made upon him.
sentences.cn: 韦维尔对历次向他提出的那些要求作了勇敢的回答.

sentences.en: What's striking today is the cumulative significance of these exertions.
sentences.cn: 今天令人惊讶的是这些措施的累积意义.

sentences.en: Your number is per the cumulative results as previously posted.
sentences.cn: 你的号码是比赛成绩公告中的号码.

phrases.tran_cn: 选民所领票数与候选人数相同的制度

trans.tran_en: increasing gradually as more of something is added or happens
